These are course notes for the "Communication in R" course given by the [Monash Bioinformatics Platform](https://www.monash.edu/researchinfrastructure/bioinformatics) for the [Monash Data Fluency](https://monashdatafluency.github.io/) initiative. Our teaching style is based on the style of [The Carpentries](https://carpentries.org/).

* [PDF version for printing](https://monashdatafluency.github.io/r-comm/r-comm.pdf)

### Source code {-}

* [GitHub page](https://github.com/MonashDataFluency/r-comm)
